 III. **[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַר‎</span>]** **verb denominative** ==acquire by paying purchase-price== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***give a dowry***, marry for a <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verb. denominative 12</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#SS|SS]]); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהָ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Ps.16.4|Ps 16:4]] usually ***obtain*** another ***in exchange*** (or, by paying a price, compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]), but text dubious; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix+ ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהֹר יִמְהָרֶנָּה לוֺ לְאִשָּׁה‎</span> [[Exod.22.15|Exod 22:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַמהֲתַלּוֺת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלל‎</span>.
